sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content:
The Window.Show procedure makes the specified window appear if it was invisible.

To make a window disappear after it's visible, you use Window.Hide.
sections.text_content:
The Window.Show procedure makes the specified window appear if it was invisible. 
To make a window disappear after it's visible, you use Window.Hide.
sections.mdown_content:
The **Window.Show** procedure makes the specified window appear if it was invisible. 
To make a window disappear after it's visible, you use **Window.Hide.**

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: When a window is hidden, output to it is faster. It is quite possible for the you to hide a window, do complicated drawing to it and then make it appear in order to have the program execute faster.
